name: My First Alphabet History
description:
@FranklinsGhost

Made for Summer Slow Jams August 2019: Edutainment Games

Made a simple alphabet table game where you have to spell the object out which will reveal some ancient history on the word and reveal it in the table.

Controls:

Click the letter in the table that you want to try and then spell out the word to reveal the ancient history of that object.

Android version isn't great as keyboard pops up over the animation.
